text: David Peter Stainwright (born 13 June 1948) is an English former professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for Nottingham Forest, Doncaster Rovers and York City, and in non-League football for Heanor Town. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Nottingham Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Heanor Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Dave Stainwright
